welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tilaran, a charming and picturesque city nestled in the heart of Costa Rica. Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to immerse yourselves in our culture and discover all that Tilaran has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Punta Islita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upala Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Upala Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
